This is an idea tha tI have in order to increase the tention and creativity=
 in this restart (to name it some how). instead you choose the faction that=
 you belong at first, the election will be radmonly:

Example:

  1.. Let g=
ive a Maxis number 1, Preds no 2, minions 3 and tripeducus 4. 
  2.. You wo=
n't know what's the faction name under the number. 
  3.. You will said ran=
dmonly: Nighlight will go with number 3, Windlord with munber 2 and Rodimus=
 witn number 2. 
  4.. All chars that will survive and be found in stasis i=
n Earth would be found by menbers whose belongs the number.
  5.. You can d=
o all rerprogramation and changes that wish.
Why that? In order to burst cr=
eativity, tention and plots. 

If a bot is founded by members of a rival fa=
ction, can you imagine what might happen?

Of course this is an idea 

Inca=
se that this idea be aprobed, council members will share the code and what =
number belongs to each faction each other,  and they will follow a similar =
proces. Same ida can be aplied to new chars made for the 'restart' but just=
 for this time. 

After Re-star runs, characters will goinf faction/creat o=
ne, as ussually have done.

What do you think about this idea?
